website_summaries.verdict: These ultra-bright emergency lights can be kept on hand a long time before you use them.
pros: Guaranteed to last up to 2 yr. in storage
After they're lit, they last a very long time
The green color lasts the longest
Tends to be brighter than other brands
cons: Super-bright light begins to dim at about the 8 hr

customer_reviews.title: Great product, definitely on par with Cyalume
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few brands to test, and this was one of them. Cyalume, as you may or may not know, is who provides chem lights for the military, so I bought some of theirs but saw a lot of very good reviews for this brand as well, so I thought I'd give them a shot! I tested them right along side of the Cyalumes, and they were every bit as good. I was amazed at how long they lasted--mine were still putting off a bit of light at the 24 hour mark! Great product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Clint F.

customer_reviews.title: These items were perfect when the eye of Irma hit
customer_reviews.text: These items were perfect when the eye of Irma hit. Much brighter than the off brand I had. Here is a pitcher during the storm. And at a great price. Will buy these again if need arise's.
customer_reviews.author: JasonR

customer_reviews.title: OK buy. B-
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright glow sticks. they start to fade noticeably when you hit the 8 hour mark, but last 10 hours decently. they are all individually wrapped, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and the brightness last for about 8 hours. Definitely a great but and to have in and emergency or dark setting.
customer_reviews.author: SGH

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These things are bright and last! I had to test one for myself and got almost 12 hours from it before it finally died off. I will admit I was weary about ordering these but was definitely worth the risk. I will be ordering more in the near future, just wish they had a few more colors to select from as long as they were as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Lights are bright and burn WAY longer than I was anticipating. Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: ShakaBrah

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Glowsticks arrived well-packaged. Randomly tested one of the ten glowsticks in the package at it worked fine. No issues snapping the glowstick to light it up. Very bright and lasted pretty long. Good to have on-hand in the event of a power outage or emergency where illumination may be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Price, value, other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for emergencies and or B.O.B , get home bags. They work as advertised, a few have found their way in to our IFAK & general first aid kits . There small , packable and very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: BKP830

customer_reviews.title: Big, Bright and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I will use these for emergencies. I tested one and it remained bright all night. They are huge which is great.. they are not even remotely like the small ones you get at a normal store. These are the real deal. I put one in the freezer after 4 hours of use, I pulled it out a few days later and it gave me another few hours light.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Buy them for any emergency scenario!
customer_reviews.text: These last a long time! Not only did it come with a lot, but the total duration of light you get is incredible. I got the same performance as the other reviews. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I used them to hang from my tent's ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I used them to hang from my tent's tie downs and stakes so we wouldn't have to worry about tripping in the middle of the night. They lasted at least 10 hours for us! They gave off enough light to be seen but not to much where they are distracting if you are trying to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but fun
customer_reviews.text: Super bright but not for long. It fills out in brightness within a few hours about 3-4. But okay product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Reliable stick lights....
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say.....A good light stick, no issues to this point with the light sticks during freezing weather or after truck/temps warm up.. They work for me so I haven't ever felt the need to try something else to compare. ((:
customer_reviews.author: Steve 55

customer_reviews.title: Very bright. Funtional. Excellent seller. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... chem-lights, very bright, long lasting. Good price. Excellent communication and follow up from this seller. I highly recommend purchasing from Recon Medical.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Glow Stick to compared with RECON. Although GS has a brighter light (not much difference, but brighter), RECON lasted much longer with higher intensities. It surpassed the 12hr duration, of course with a very dim light on the 12 hour period, but enough to be noticed on very dank areas.
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR R RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve used, even better than military.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. I snapped the first one in a dark room and it was bright enough to light the entire room for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: ItsCorpsBoy!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, lasts way longer than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a box to add one to each of my Ned kits and vehicles for emergency use. I opened and tested one stick and it stayed very bright for 24 hours and took almost 40 hours to completely lose its glow. Not sure if all of them will last that long but that one last more than 3 times the advertised time. Very bright, very impressive, great value. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies and children.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased about five packs of these in the past two years. They're great for emergencies and for the kids to play with when it gets dark. They say they're only good for about 12 hours but most of mine have lasted beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very good chem lights.
customer_reviews.text: Lasts very long but didn't illuminate a far distance. Maybe a meter all around. Ended up just using them as marker lights.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: 10 Pack Green Tactical BreakLights
customer_reviews.text: I love these break lights! There are just what I wanted to put in my "Emergency Home Disaster Kit" Excellent product that works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Freeman

customer_reviews.title: They seem ok so far...decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I used one the other day and they worked longer than the dollar store ones (but not as long as the military ones my spouse uses). I’ll keep the rest in my car for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but out of date..
customer_reviews.text: These came fast and boxed neatly. I cracked one to test one and lasted 12 hours.UPDATE. I noticed the date on these. Go with another product if you are prepping. I did try one and it glowed for 24 hours soooo they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best glow sticks on the market still had glow after 24hrs I put it in the freezer for 4 hours to recharge it and was alot brighter once thawed probably half as bright as a new one will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Second order
customer_reviews.text: I liked the products so much that I placed this second order to give to my adult daughter and her family.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: The one I tested glowed brightly for over 12 hours and still had a soft glow 24 hours late. Going in our ditchbag.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hoffman Sr

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome used them to navigate my pitch black home during a power outage. Extremely bright... will definitely be buying more awesome for emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Man

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff per usual by Recon Medical.
customer_reviews.text: Man, I never doubt anything put out by recon medical. Always putting out great products. Highly recommend these, super bright, built tough. Buy em now so you’re not stuck in the dark during a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Javi Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow I tested one when they arrived and it stayed lit for almost 25 hours. I couldn’t believe it. Buy these especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but only light up a small area barely ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but only light up a small area barely enough to see. They are very bright and visible far away, just not ideal for lighting up a dark room or cave.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Good sticks at a good price. Lasted a long time.  Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good sticks at a good price. Lasted a long time. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JSMCO

customer_reviews.title: Good for Camping
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Lined a path to the bathroom at night to avoid big rocks.
customer_reviews.author: toorude89

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Used for a low light shoot course last night. Brightest chemical lights out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last way longer then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Best glow sticks ever!!! Work great in the dark and love that can be hung for lighting up the pathway if needed
customer_reviews.author: Corey bean

customer_reviews.title: Theseare awesome. We had a power outage due to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Theseare awesome. We had a power outage due to a wind storm and these snap lights provided enough light to keep a very large office space running until the business was shut down 6 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a emergency kit, but ended up giving them for my kids to play with. The product instantly shined bright once activated. My kids played with them throughout the night. I will be purchasing again and in different color too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Marable

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Keep in the clove box of all my cars for emergency use
customer_reviews.author: An Aussie Farming in the Philippines

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and lifetime warrenty can't beat it reccomend to anyone looking for this type of product
customer_reviews.author: George jones

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...fast service. Will be using for a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Alice H.

customer_reviews.title: Satisified with product
customer_reviews.text: These are not all the bright although if you opened a few then it might lighten up a dark room or tent
customer_reviews.author: M.P. Wills

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with the green light.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect for hanging on my tent door at night during hunting trips. The light is just bright enough to see anything close to the door and last all night. Great for keeping critters away from the tent!!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright last long enough for what i want them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem great
customer_reviews.text: But you look like a good product I have not used them and we are saving them for if I need them during hurricane really
customer_reviews.author: chuck collins

customer_reviews.title: Very bright but don’t come with a string
customer_reviews.text: The glow sticks are very bright making them extremely visible at night. They didn’t come with a string to make a necklace or to use to tie onto anything which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa Marie Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Product was as described, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my tornado/earthquake/Trump did something really stupid kit. Hope I never have to use them. But they arrived quickly and were as described.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Worlow

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It did work for me.. they didn't glow for even an hour and the light was so dim :( I don't know if I should return or not
customer_reviews.author: Emelie

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Would pruchase again
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised and represented. Great price. Would pruchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Still giving off a very slight glow 20 hours later.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap but high quality. Still just barely glowing 20 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great at the right price. Will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: They do last last 12 hours of giving a room usable murky green light. Thankfully, our order arrived before Irma did. One placed in the middle of the room provides enough light to walk around without bumping into things and being able to distinguish your wife from a sofa. I wouldn’t try using it for reading but it is useful in emergencies. We bought extra after Hurricane Irma and I keep some in the car as well. Just be sure to buy before you need them. After Irma most everyone was sold out on these and some suppliers were charging triple.
customer_reviews.author: RJC2u

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. These are bright. I received them in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambience, not a lot of light.
customer_reviews.text: These lights will illuminate a small area of the room. They provided a lovely ambience during the five day power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Brightest
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple different companies, and found these to be the best for the buck-
customer_reviews.author: BIRD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They came on time. Will be great in my emergency kits.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeOne

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to break lights, they work great and are from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work wonderfully, super bright and they last for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Always a good idea to keep a bunch in hand for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great packaging, showed up fast, exactly what I was looking for. Will buy these breaklights again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Pecaut

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BRIGHT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with brightness and lasting brightness of these glowsticks. I get a solid 6 hours of bright light with these glow sticks. A perfect accessory for a bug-out bag.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Payen

customer_reviews.title: Bright, long lasting chem light.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should and lasts longer than I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: WitchDoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a glow stick they glow 😁
customer_reviews.author: Randell Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have item for emergencies, power outages and safety for children at night.
customer_reviews.text: I intend to order more. This is a quality product at a fair price. Every household should have these.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cahill

customer_reviews.title: No batteries needed
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet, part of my Hurricane kit.
customer_reviews.author: David Roe

customer_reviews.title: This product is direct and to the point, the way it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Easy, convenient, bright and long-lasting. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph Basial

customer_reviews.title: A great fix for a SARx!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for and needing. Was gearing up for A SARx for the CAP and needed them to fill a required gear list. Great price great service!
customer_reviews.author: Skipper 077th.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and amazing customer service. Will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: WH1SKEYTANGO

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I love them, very bright and one is still on after 12 hrs of cracking it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product a must have in these uncertain times...be prepared...
customer_reviews.author: HoodProtector

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are still glowing, and it's been 7 hours of useable light.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: These lights where awesome brightness was above expectation way brighter than Chem light ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights where awesome brightness was above expectation way brighter than Chem light my buddy was using and they did last 12 hours
customer_reviews.author: Douglas bell

customer_reviews.title: Green Tactical Breaklights
customer_reviews.text: Needed breaklights. Ordered online. Delivered fast. Happy with the product. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: John Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They do what they are supposed to are bright and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Product is good quality. Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Received order when promised. Product is good quality. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You dirty hippy! These are not your normal glow sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: Anybody want to disco? NO! You dirty hippy! These are not your normal glow sticks you find at Coachella or a hipster rave. These are TUFF! Well built and have an octagon shape to prevent rolling. Ample light for hours. Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick caviness

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery but almost a year old.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up quickly. They list as being good for 2 years but the manufacturer date on them is 11 months old. So I'm guessing they are only good for 1 year now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pedneault

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: thank you. i purchased them for emergencies, great item to have. glad that i purchased them. never even thought of glow sticks for emergencies before.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Havent used any of these lights yet. I am using these in my emergency pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Moehring

customer_reviews.title: Didn't send 90% of the package
customer_reviews.text: I received only one glow stick when there was supposed to be a package of 10. We will now have to buy these locally as they were ordered for a child's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Bieniarz

customer_reviews.title: The chemlights (breaklights) are great, however the individual boxes I received were damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: The chemlights (breaklights) are great , however the individual boxes I received were damaged Badly. Besides that I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
